import React,{useEffect,lazy}from'react';import{Routes,Route,useParams,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useLanguage}from'../contexts/LanguageContext';// Lazy load pages for better performance

if(!isValidLanguage){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/es/",replace:true});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/personajes3d",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Personajes3DPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/lmspricing",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LMSPricing,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/resources",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResourcesPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/courses",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CoursesPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/experience",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperiencePage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/portfolio",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/portfolio/:slug",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioDetails,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/coming-soon",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ComingSoonPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/ai-proficiency-challenge",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XRAIProficiencyChallenge,{})})]});};export default LanguageRouter;
